title: 2BR/2BA Available Move-In Mid-July to August 1st
description:
Hello! Looking for TWO people to take over the lease for a 2br/2ba apartment in the Powelton Village area of University City, a 15-20min walk to Drexel and UPenn! Move-in can be between July 22nd-August 1st, and the lease term would end in June 2024, with the option to renew. Rent and all utilities (including wifi) are $1200 per person per month ($2400 total).
The apartment comes furnished with IN-UNIT laundry and a dishwasher, a couch and coffee table in the living room, a dresser, a full bed frame/mattress, closet space, and a desk in each bedroom. The central AC and heating are controlled within the apartment.
There is ample, free street parking in front of the apartment and the perpendicular/adjacent streets, as well as bike lanes. I have had no issues finding parking since I moved here. There is a bike room in the building and locked mailboxes. The apartment is near various cafes and restaurants, within walking distance of the Schuylkill River/Fairmount Park, and the area is patrolled by Drexel and UPenn Police regularly, so I’ve felt safe here. The building is only a couple of years old, and maintenance/management is responsive!
I’ve attached images/videos of what the apartment looks like. If you’re interested or have other questions, please please reach out to me!

title: 3 br Sunny Home in Newbold Area of South Philly
description:
We call this spacious sun-filled home "Studly Dudley." Updated with central air conditioning and heat, newer appliances, remodeled kitchen, and ample closet space. Hardwoods throughout. Available July 1.
NEIGHBORHOOD
Friendly street with both long-term and new neighbors in Newbold/West Passyunk. Just blocks from some of the best eateries, stores, and cafes. Turn the corner on Mifflin to find Ultimo, the South Philly Taproom, and more. Short walk to the subway and Passyunk cafes, shops, and bars. Also 1.5 miles to Rittenhouse Square and the rest of Center City via 18th.
FEATURES
Granite countertops, newer stainless steel gas stove, fridge, & microwave, newer cabinetry; updated bathroom w/subway tile; small outdoor space, large well-lit basement with newer washer and dryer; on-street parking typically available (zone 27 permit ~$30/year).
TERMS
One year lease. First, last, and security deposit ($1,700 each) due upon signing. Owner pays for water/sewer/trash ($75-100 value). Tenant pays all other utilities (electric/gas). $45 application fee. No smoking. Gross annual income requirement is standard 3x monthly rent ($61,200).
ABOUT US
We are a responsible couple who rent a few other homes in South Philly and take pride in not just the upkeep of our homes but being considerate and responsive to our tenants.
Email us to set up a showing (no calls please). Showings begin on the 16th, move-in July 1. We are flexible during the day/evenings and are nearby.

Looking for a new home that you can move into right away? Look no further than this home in Regent Row, where you can enjoy contemporary and urban living in the heart of Old Kensington, Philadelphia.
Regent Row is a stunning townhome community in the heart of Old Kensington, Philadelphia. Designed by Atrium Design Group, these homes offer a contemporary and urban living experience with a modern exterior consisting of concrete, Hardie plank, steel, and glass. Inside, the innovatively designed space features three bedrooms, two and a half bathrooms, a one-car garage, finished basement, and city-view roof decks. Notable interior features include a full floor master suite with two balconies, a gourmet kitchen with quartz countertops and custom high gloss cabinetry, hardwood floors throughout, and an abundance of natural light. The outdoor space is equally impressive, with a second-floor deck, a fourth-floor/master suite balcony, and an expansive roof deck offering scenic views of Philadelphia. The neighborhood around Regent Row is a walker's paradise, with a Walk Score of 95, meaning that daily errands do not require a car. The Market-Frankford Line subway runs nearby, providing easy access to other parts of the city. When it comes to dining and entertainment, you're spoiled for choice. State Side Vodka, LMNO, Kalaya, Suraya, Evil Genius Brewing, Four Humours, Buzz Cafe, Behive Cake Shop, and more are all just steps away from your front door. For outdoor enthusiasts, the nearby Penn Treaty Park offers beautiful views of the Delaware River, while the neighborhood's vibrant arts scene boasts galleries and studios dotting the streets.
Whether you prefer a night in this stunning home or out exploring the lively neighborhood, Regent Row is the perfect place to call home. Come see for yourself why these townhomes are the talk of the town!
